org.mortbay.util
Class IO

java.lang.Object
  org.mortbay.component.AbstractLifeCycle
      org.mortbay.thread.BoundedThreadPool
          org.mortbay.util.IO
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, LifeCycle, ThreadPool
public class IO
extends BoundedThreadPool

IO Utilities. Provides stream handling utilities in singleton Threadpool implementation accessed by static members.

See Also:
Serialized Form
